channel.title: Markdown on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Blowfish

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Markdown
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown formatting that can be used in Blowfish, also it shows how some basic HTML elements are decorated.
